import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import "./styles.css" import menuContext from '../context/menuContext'; const Menu = () => { const context = useContext(menuContext); const { addMenu } = context; const [menu, setMenu] = useState({ category: "", menus: "", description: "" }) const categories = ["Chinese", "Italian", "Indian", "Beverages"]; const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(""); // State for the selected category const handleCategorySelect = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); setMenu({ ...menu, category }); // Update the category in the menu state } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setMenu({ category: "", menus: "", description: "" }); } const onChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setMenu({ ...menu, [name]: value }); } return (

Add New Category

    • ))}

) } export default Menu
